name: Playgrounds of the Future (Doublewide - Left Side)
description:
Playgrounds of the Future (Picture A)

My first full playground sculpted in virtual reality at a 1:1 scale.

Being in VR, I was able to feel like I was physically climbing everything as it was being sculpted. Every shape, squiggle, and form was drawn where I needed or wanted something to grab, climb, rest, or play.

Sculpted in Gravity Sketch, rendered in Blender. 2020
